Watch Out For the Hounds

Release

As a solo artist, André has earned 6 Grammy Awards, 4 Emmy Awards and dozens of accolades around the world.
In 2002, André released his debut solo album, Justified, which has sold over eight million copies worldwide.

André’s second solo album, FutureSex/LoveSounds, was released in 2006 and produced four #1 singles including “SexyBack,” “My Love,” “What Goes Around…Comes Around” and “Summer Love.” With his three solo albums, André has sold over 18 million albums worldwide. On all three albums, André was the chief songwriter and producer.
